USE demo
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE ServerlessView
AS
-- BEGIN

-- DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
-- set @statement = N'
-- CREATE OR ALTER VIEW public_holidays
-- AS
-- SELECT *
-- FROM
--     OPENROWSET(
--         BULK     ''https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/holidaydatacontainer/Processed/*.parquet'',
--         FORMAT = ''parquet''
--     ) AS [result]
-- '

SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/holidaydatacontainer/Processed/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result]



-- EXEC (@statement)

-- END
-- GO
